tool_description: FlightsLogic provides Flight API, Airline Consolidator, Flight Aggregator to the travel agents, tour operators and travel companies worldwide.
name: Flight Integration
title: Flight Integration

api_list.name: Flight Integration
api_list.description: FlightsLogic provides Flight API, Airline Consolidator, Flight Aggregator to the travel agents, tour operators and travel companies worldwide.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flight-integration.p.rapidapi.comhttps://flightslogic.com/fareapi.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flight-integration.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
